text:
@Mike_Pence You have lost all credibility 

Texas orders body bags, mortuary trucks as coronavirus deaths rise
FEMA is sending 14 refrigerated trucks to the state next week — on top of the eight that were already sent — to serve as temporary mortuaries.

Read in CNBC: https://t.co/spJbgv7vGw
